name: Glitch Boi
description:
A simple platformer where you play as a small bug... thing and collect diamonds. Your goal? Diamonds. Your purpose? Diamonds. Your reason to play? Diamonds (not real  ones, I am not giving away free diamonds). Reason to keep living after a ceaseless amount of deaths?  YES,shiny shiny diamonds!

Try your best to complete each of the 5 levels at your best ability avoiding traps, enemies, missiles and even the ground(sometimes), how cool

-Link for the Android version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Electromaster.GlitchBoi1

In case you are not a pro-skilled MLG gamer like me who had to tediously play this game countless times to actually you know... MAKE the game!, you may be interested in some CHEATS, listed as below(cheats may be entered directly any time during gameplay and dont need special screen):

-oneup: 999 lives

-underworld: find out what it does:)

-dddaaawwwsss: You turn into more invisible than Mr incredible on steroids

-moni: Gives you 9 coins

More cheats, updates and stuff may be released as I continue to develop my skills on game-development,  so please do not hesitate to place any constructive criticism in the reviews, social media or elsewhere, thats how I git gud
